name: Zest Venture Sdn. Bhd.
description: Operator of a wedding card-based retail platform intended to offer an easy, fast, and stress-free process of personalized wedding cards to customers. The company's platform engages in the selling, printing, designing, and distribution of personalized invitation and greeting cards, enabling designers to sell their work globally specialized for wedding, kids, and lifestyle products.
one_liner: Operator of a wedding card-based retail platform intended to offer an easy, fast, and stress-free process of personalized wedding cards to customers. The company's platform engages in the selling, printing, designing, and distribution of personalized invitation and greeting cards, enabling designers to sell their work globally specialized for wedding, kids, and lifestyle products.
